law.catch_line: Use of unexpired time; maximum parking time.

text.section:
Sec. 30-382. Use of unexpired time; maximum parking time.
The driver of a vehicle entering a parking space at a time when the meter for such space shows unexpired time may permit such vehicle to remain parked in such space for the amount of unexpired time shown on such meter, or may by depositing the proper coin remain parked in such space for the maximum amount of time allowed by the deposit of said coin as indicated on said meter.
